title: Assassins Update - Trist
body:
Hello, the answer to my question is probably pretty obvious but i wanted to ask anyway.

Whats the chances of AP Trist getting buffs in the assassin update patch, i know they nerfed her a while back but since other assassins will be changed a bit and probably updated to be stronger in someway would trist getting any small buffs now that other assassins will be brought back up to standard.

Its already pretty hard to play AP Trist so if the other assasins get buffed and she doesn't i may have to drop playing her.
